item.title: Shocking Video Of Rampaging Elephant As One Man Is Killed And Two Injured
item.description:
Shocking Video Of Rampaging Elephant As One Man Is Killed And Two Injured

This is the shocking moment an elephant went on the rampage in an attack that led to the death of a 40-year-old man. In the video, the elephant throws a man into the air in the West Bengal state of India.

item.title: Life Is Hell After Narcan, Heroin's Miracle Cure
item.description:
Life Is Hell After Narcan, Heroin's Miracle Cure

REALITY CHECK PHILADELPHIA - Michael Charles Meeney turned 26 in jail on March 2, a week after his arrest for misdemeanor heroin possession. But his entire life may as well boil down to an inglorious 30 seconds of tightly edited video, played on local news channels, that shows him nearly dying.

item.title: What today's Supreme Court decision means for the future of legal weed
item.description:
What today's Supreme Court decision means for the future of legal weed

The Supreme Court's decision today to toss out a lawsuit that could have brought Colorado's legal marijuana boom to a screeching halt hasn't deterred opponents of the national legalization effort. Already, the plaintiffs and their supporters are defiant and looking to regroup.

item.title: Report: Peyton Manning spurns Colts' one-day deal, retires with Broncos
item.description:
Report: Peyton Manning spurns Colts' one-day deal, retires with Broncos

Peyton Manning's NFL swan song hasn't reached its final note. First there were the weeks of intense rumors and debate about Manning's future. Then, multiple retirement ceremonies, first one with the Broncos and then one with the Colts. We're not done yet though! There's still the matter of which franchise with whom Manning will choose to retire.

item.title: Britney Spears Celebrated the First Day of Spring with a Teeny, Tiny Yellow String Bikini
item.description:
Britney Spears Celebrated the First Day of Spring with a Teeny, Tiny Yellow String Bikini

What better way to celebrate the first day of spring than with a bikini? Britney Spears flaunted her toned bikini body on Sunday when she shared a shot of herself soaking up the sun while wearing a tiny yellow bikini. (Yes, the same two-piece that she had a beach dance party in earlier this month.)

item.title: Kesha Appeals Judge's Dr. Luke Decision, Claims Career Will 'Fade Quickly'
item.description:
Kesha Appeals Judge's Dr. Luke Decision, Claims Career Will 'Fade Quickly'

Much of the outcry over a New York court's recent decision that Kesha can not be let out of her contract with Sony and Dr. Luke, despite her claims that he raped her, was about emotion.

item.title: Brussels Airport Attack: Live Blog
item.description:
Brussels Airport Attack: Live Blog

From Yahoo News: Two explosions have ripped through Brussels airport during the rush hour causing several casualties. Follow all the latest in our live blog:
